alert.note: Alert for Bernalillo; Catron; Cibola; McKinley; Sandoval; Socorro; Valencia (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 26 at 10:57AM MST until February 26 at 11:30AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM MST FOR EASTERN CIBOLA...EAST CENTRAL MCKINLEY...NORTHWESTERN VALENCIA... SOUTHWESTERN SANDOVAL...NORTHWESTERN SOCORRO...BERNALILLO AND NORTHEASTERN CATRON COUNTIES... At 1057 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 17 miles south of Pueblo Pintado to 11 miles west of Acoma Pueblo to 9 miles east of Old Horse Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 64 and 136. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 47 and 111. Locations impacted include... Grants, Laguna Pueblo, Datil, Milan, Magdalena, Acoma Pueblo, Cebolletita, Mesita, Old Horse Springs and Prewitt. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and turn on headlights! The visibility will suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

area.areaDesc: Bernalillo; Catron; Cibola; McKinley; Sandoval; Socorro; Valencia
